sentence: Are any of the courses I 've taken hardware courses ?
sql: SELECT COURSEalias0.DEPARTMENT , COURSEalias0.NAME , COURSEalias0.NUMBER FROM COURSE AS COURSEalias0 INNER JOIN STUDENT_RECORD AS STUDENT_RECORDalias0 ON STUDENT_RECORDalias0.COURSE_ID = COURSEalias0.COURSE_ID INNER JOIN AREA AS AREAalias0 ON STUDENT_RECORDalias0.COURSE_ID = AREAalias0.COURSE_ID WHERE AREAalias0.AREA LIKE "%hardware%" AND STUDENT_RECORDalias0.STUDENT_ID = 1 ;
